So This Is What Kourtney Kardashian’s Doing Now That She’s Left

Following her shocking physical confrontation with Kim Kardashian West, Kourtney Kardashian has officially decided to step away from her major role on Keep
title: Meghan Markle's Dad Wasn't At The Royal Wedding, But He's Got Some Thoughts

meta_data.title: Meghan Markles Dad Misses Wedding, Comments From CA
meta_data.description: Thomas Markle, Meghan Markle's father, wasn't able to attend the Royal Wedding — but he still made a statement. See what he had to say here.
